tags.name: i
tags.description: The i element is used to represent an icon. The icons used are from the Lucide icon set.

attributes.name: data-lucide
attributes.description: Specifies the name of the icon to display.

tags.name: ui-button
tags.description: Custom button component based on the Preline UI design system.

attributes.name: href
attributes.description: Passes a href to the button, this will wrap the button in an anchor tag.

attributes.name: color
attributes.description: Specifies the color of the button.

attributes.name: fill
attributes.description: Specifies the fill type of the button.

attributes.name: size
attributes.description: Specifies the size of the button.

attributes.name: round
attributes.description: Makes the button have rounded corners.

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description: Disables the button and prevents user interaction.

attributes.name: loading
attributes.description: Shows a loading spinner inside the button.

tags.name: ui-dropdown
tags.description: Custom button component based on the Preline UI design system.

attributes.name: placement
attributes.description: Specifies the position of the menu when opened.

attributes.name: auto-close
attributes.description: Specifies the zone, when clicked, which will close the menu.

attributes.name: fill
attributes.description: Sets the position to absolute instead of fixed, and removes the transform styles to position the menu relative to the relative parent block.

attributes.name: offset
attributes.description: Sets the dropdown's bottom or top offset.

attributes.name: flip
attributes.description: Flips the menu's placement when it starts to overlap its reference element.

tags.name: ui-drone-viewer
tags.description: Custom drone viewer which displays the 3D model of the current selected drone.
